--- title: Overview fabricator: true ---

{{title}}

This UI toolkit is a highly-modular design system for rapid web page development. It contains different materials that can be assembled into more complex page layouts. It includes working examples, code snippets and documentation.

Sections

Colors
Reference palettes for branding and UI state colors.
Icons
An index of all available SVG icons.
Typography
Examples of foundational typographic elements like headings, paragraphs and lists.
Layout
Examples of grid classes for building column-based layouts.
Components
Examples of all common interface elements, simple and complex, including all of their alternate variations.
Utilities
Examples of low-level utility classes available for targeting specific style properties.
Docs
General documentation of naming conventions and template usage.
Sandbox
A collection of mockups, demonstrations, proofs-of-concept or anything else that might not be production-ready.
